title: SFEC Campaign Consultant Report - City Officeholders & Employees
description: A. SUMMARY This dataset contains information about the Employment of Local Officeholders and City Employees section of the Campaign Consultant Report. For more information, visit the Ethics Commission’s webpage on Campaign Consultants. B. HOW THE DATASET IS CREATED Data for this dataset is created when campaign consultants electronically file the following reports with employment information: Form 3 – Quarterly Disclosure Report for Campaign Consultants Form 6 – Campaign Consultant Termination Statement This dataset contains reports filings starting from December 9, 2024, when electronic filing of campaign consultant reports will be required. C. UPDATE PROCESS The dataset is updated via the Socrata Publisher API as needed when form filings are submitted and signed by campaign consultants. D. HOW TO USE THIS DATASET The unique row identifier for an employment entry is “Entry Id”. This dataset should be joined with the SFEC Campaign Consultant Report dataset by “Envelope Id”. E. RELATED DATASETS For detail reporting on campaign consultant activities, visit SFEC Campaign Consultant Report.

columns.name: LocalOfficeholderAndCityEmployeesList Name First
columns.description: First name of city officeholder or employee employed by the campaign consultant or client

columns.name: LocalOfficeholderAndCityEmployeesList Name Last
columns.description: Last name of city officeholder or employee employed by the campaign consultant or client

columns.name: LocalOfficeholderAndCityEmployeesList Department
columns.description: Department of city officeholder or employee

columns.name: LocalOfficeholderAndCityEmployeesList Title
columns.description: Title of of city officeholder or employee

columns.name: LocalOfficeholderAndCityEmployeesList DescribeTheNatureOfServices
columns.description: Describe the nature of services provided by the local officeholder or City employee

columns.name: LocalOfficeholderAndCityEmployeesList WasEmployedByAClient
columns.description: Was the local officeholder or employee employed by a client of the campaign consultant at the campaign consultant's behest?

columns.name: FilingSeries
columns.description: Combines consultant name, report type, and report start date
